org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild

Class JkJavaBuild.JkOptionPack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.builtins.javabuild.JkJavaBuild.JkOptionPack
  • Enclosing class:
    JkJavaBuild

    public static final class JkJavaBuild.JkOptionPack
extends java.lang.Object
    Options about archive packaging.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String checksums
      Comma separated list of algorithm to use to produce checksums (ex : 'sha-1,md5').
      boolean fatJar
      When true, produce a fat-jar, meaning a jar embedding all the dependencies.
      java.lang.String fatJarSuffix
      Gives the suffix that will be appended at the end of the 'normal' jar for naming the fat jar.
      boolean javadoc
      When true, javadoc is created and packed in a jar file.
      boolean signWithPgp
      When true, the produced artifacts are signed with PGP
      boolean tests
      When true, tests classes and sources are packed in jars.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JkOptionPack() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • fatJar

        public boolean fatJar
        When true, produce a fat-jar, meaning a jar embedding all the dependencies.

      • signWithPgp

        public boolean signWithPgp
        When true, the produced artifacts are signed with PGP

      • tests

        public boolean tests
        When true, tests classes and sources are packed in jars.

      • checksums

        public java.lang.String checksums
        Comma separated list of algorithm to use to produce checksums (ex : 'sha-1,md5').

      • javadoc

        public boolean javadoc
        When true, javadoc is created and packed in a jar file.

      • fatJarSuffix

        public java.lang.String fatJarSuffix
        Gives the suffix that will be appended at the end of the 'normal' jar for naming the fat jar. If the name of the normal jar is mylib.jar and the suffix is uber then the fat jar file name will be mylib-uber.jar.

      • JkOptionPack

        public JkOptionPack()
